document_data.title: Secret Password
document_data.author: Uncredited
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Secret Password''''' was a single-sided single-sheet product featured a page of writing suitable for DMs to use as player handouts for thieves' guilds.

[[Category:2nd edition sourcebooks]]
[[Category:Published in 1998]]
